comment.author: 46696233@N00
comment._content: MRS. FILTER'S PAIR WINS TWO RIBBONS; Florham King and Pink Lady Double Victors in Hollywood Horse Show. Mrs. C. Cecil Fitler of Riverton, near Philadelphia, gathered in the lion's share of the blue ribbons and the accompanying honors yesterday at the initial session of the Monmouth County Horse Show at Hollywood, West End, Long Branch, which will engage the attention of lovers of harness and saddle horses for the remainder of the week. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=940CE0DD1131E233A...
